__e: I got three of these damn foster kids.
- It makes me sick to my stomach to see... to see you teaching those damn kids when you're too afraid to have another child of your own!
Your mother drove me nuts for 47 goddamn years.
It's been three damn years, so why don't we start talking?
Alright, your mom died five fuckin' years ago, okay?
I do not know where your damn money is.
Brought you your damn money, so you can just cut this thing off my leg.
- Stick 'em up, [Bleep]. - Aah! Give me your wallet.
